CustomField.formula: IF ( TEXT(Site_Contract__r.Number_of_Services__c) <> ""," Number of Services : "&TEXT(Site_Contract__r.Number_of_Services__c)&BR(),"") &" Number of Open Visits : "& TEXT(Site_Contract__r.Number_of_Open_Visits__c) &BR() &" Next Scheduled Open Visit : "& TEXT(Site_Contract__r.Next_Planned_Fire_Extinguisher_Visit__c)&BR() &" Last Completed Visit : "& TEXT( Site_Contract__r.Last_Completed_Visit__c )&BR() &" Number of Completed Visits : "& TEXT(Site_Contract__r.Number_of_Completed_Visits__c) &" Visit Rescheduling : "& Site_Contract__r.Visit_Rescheduling_Formula__c &" Status : "& TEXT( Site_Contract__r.AM_Status__c )
CustomField.label: Site Contract Dates
